00005 from tweepy.error import TweepError
00006 
00007 class Cursor(object):
00008     """Pagination helper class"""
00009 
00010     def __init__(self, method, *args, **kargs):
00011         if hasattr(method, 'pagination_mode'):
00012             if method.pagination_mode == 'cursor':
00013                 self.iterator = CursorIterator(method, args, kargs)
00014             else:
00015                 self.iterator = PageIterator(method, args, kargs)
00016         else:
00017             raise TweepError('This method does not perform pagination')
00018 
00019     def pages(self, limit=0):
00020         """Return iterator for pages"""
00021         if limit > 0:
00022             self.iterator.limit = limit
00023         return self.iterator
00024 
00025     def items(self, limit=0):
00026         """Return iterator for items in each page"""
00027         i = ItemIterator(self.iterator)
00028         i.limit = limit
00029         return i
00030 
00031 class BaseIterator(object):
00032 
00033     def __init__(self, method, args, kargs):
00034         self.method = method
00035         self.args = args
00036         self.kargs = kargs
00037         self.limit = 0
00038 
00039     def next(self):
00040         raise NotImplementedError
00041 
00042     def prev(self):
00043         raise NotImplementedError
00044 
00045     def __iter__(self):
00046         return self
00047 
00048 class CursorIterator(BaseIterator):
00049 
00050     def __init__(self, method, args, kargs):
00051         BaseIterator.__init__(self, method, args, kargs)
00052         self.next_cursor = -1
00053         self.prev_cursor = 0
00054         self.count = 0
00055 
00056     def next(self):
00057         if self.next_cursor == 0 or (self.limit and self.count == self.limit):
00058             raise StopIteration
00059         data, cursors = self.method(
00060                 cursor=self.next_cursor, *self.args, **self.kargs
00061         )
00062         self.prev_cursor, self.next_cursor = cursors
00063         if len(data) == 0:
00064             raise StopIteration
00065         self.count += 1
00066         return data
00067 
00068     def prev(self):
00069         if self.prev_cursor == 0:
00070             raise TweepError('Can not page back more, at first page')
00071         data, self.next_cursor, self.prev_cursor = self.method(
00072                 cursor=self.prev_cursor, *self.args, **self.kargs
00073         )
00074         self.count -= 1
00075         return data
00076 
00077 class PageIterator(BaseIterator):
00078 
00079     def __init__(self, method, args, kargs):
00080         BaseIterator.__init__(self, method, args, kargs)
00081         self.current_page = 0
00082 
00083     def next(self):
00084         self.current_page += 1
00085         items = self.method(page=self.current_page, *self.args, **self.kargs)
00086         if len(items) == 0 or (self.limit > 0 and self.current_page > self.limit):
00087             raise StopIteration
00088         return items
00089 
00090     def prev(self):
00091         if (self.current_page == 1):
00092             raise TweepError('Can not page back more, at first page')
00093         self.current_page -= 1
00094         return self.method(page=self.current_page, *self.args, **self.kargs)
00095 
00096 class ItemIterator(BaseIterator):
00097 
00098     def __init__(self, page_iterator):
00099         self.page_iterator = page_iterator
00100         self.limit = 0
00101         self.current_page = None
00102         self.page_index = -1
00103         self.count = 0
00104 
00105     def next(self):
00106         if self.limit > 0 and self.count == self.limit:
00107             raise StopIteration
00108         if self.current_page is None or self.page_index == len(self.current_page) - 1:
00109             # Reached end of current page, get the next page...
00110             self.current_page = self.page_iterator.next()
00111             self.page_index = -1
00112         self.page_index += 1
00113         self.count += 1
00114         return self.current_page[self.page_index]
00115 
00116     def prev(self):
00117         if self.current_page is None:
00118             raise TweepError('Can not go back more, at first page')
00119         if self.page_index == 0:
00120             # At the beginning of the current page, move to next...
00121             self.current_page = self.page_iterator.prev()
00122             self.page_index = len(self.current_page)
00123             if self.page_index == 0:
00124                 raise TweepError('No more items')
00125         self.page_index -= 1
00126         self.count -= 1
00127         return self.current_page[self.page_index]
